name: A Sloping Tunnel
description:
The tunnel continues its slope upwards, and the wind 
blows at you even stronger yet.  The claw tracks in the 
stone stop abruptly here, where there seems to be a lot
of unearthed dirt and stone around, heaped upon the floor.  
You feel uneasy about this place.

extra_descriptions.description: It has been dug from somewhere, but where?

extra_descriptions.keywords: claw claws track tracks mark marks
extra_descriptions.description:
They stop very abruptly here, right where the piles of earth begin,
it seems.

The floor up ahead looks... strange.  You don't think going ahead
would be a good idea.
